title: If the owner / developer of the plot falling within the radius of 200 mt
clause_text: If the owner / developer of the plot falling within the radius of 200 mt. from the Metro Station is willing to provide Public Parking space over and above the parking spaces required as per regulation No.14.2.1.6 of this regulation, the same shall be allowed without charging premium for such additional area and in that case the overall premium shall be discounted on 50 % of such parking area while calculating premium for additional FSI allowed over and above the base FSI, subject to following conditions :-
section: Incentive for providing Public Parking in the area falling within the radius of 200 m. from the Metro / MRTS Station.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: If the owner / developer of the plot falling within the radius of 200 mt. from the Metro Station is willing to provide Public Parking space over and above the parking spaces required as per regulation
